verses.roman:
eta bali' ānila tāṅre gaṅgā-sannidhāne
āveśe prabhura haila gaṅgāre yamunā-jñāne

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; ānila—He brought; tāṅre—Him; gaṅgā-sannidhāne—near the Ganges; āveśe—in ecstasy; prabhura—of the Lord; haila—there was; gaṅgāre—of the river Ganges; yamunā-jñāne—acceptance as the river Yamunā.
translation: Saying this, Nityānanda Prabhu took Caitanya Mahāprabhu near the Ganges, and the Lord, in His ecstasy, accepted the river Ganges as the river Yamunā.
